Plot Life Expectancy Across Scenarios and Gender

plot_life_expectancy.Rd

Plot Life Expectancy Across Scenarios and Gender

Usage

plot_life_expectancy(
  df,
  age = NULL,
  disease = "all_diseases",
  show_disability = TRUE,
  show_disease = TRUE,
  alpha = 0.8
)

Arguments

df

A data frame containing life expectancy data from DYNAMO-HIA.

age

Age group to analyze. When default (NULL), the youngest age group is selected.

disease

Specific disease to analyze (default "all_diseases").

show_disability

Logical, whether to display disability impact (default TRUE)

show_disease

Logical, whether to display disease impact (default TRUE)

alpha

Transparency level for plot elements (default 0.8)

Value

A ggplot object representing life expectancy across scenarios.
